name: MedicationUseStopTypeCodeLijst-to-MedicationStatementStatus
title: HCIM MedicationUseStopTypeCodeLijst to MedicationStatementStatus
description: Maps the HCIM MedicationUse release 2017 terminology for the concept MedicationUseStopType to the FHIR STU3 terminology associated with MedicationStatement.status.
purpose: To aid in mapping from HCIM MedicationUse ValueSet MedicationUseStopTypeCodeLijst to FHIR STU3 MedicationStatement.status.
